definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: a precious stone, perhaps yellow jasper, or other gold-coloured stone (LXXL Ex 28:20, Ex 39:13 xruso/liqox, so Jos:Ant. iii. 7:5 [168], v. Petrie:Hast. DB STONES, PREOIOUS Myres:Ency. Bib. ID. § 17 Dr:Da 10:6);—´[[כְּעֵין ת]]: Ez Eze 1:6; ´[[כְּעֵין אֵבֶן ת]]: Eze 10:9; in list of gems Eze 28:13, Ex 28:20, Ex 39:13; in sim. of resplendent body Da 10:6, cf. Ct So 5:14.
